lead_paragraph: News content posted by publishers will show up less prominently, resulting in less traffic to companies that have come to rely on Facebook audiences.

byline.contributor: Mike Isaac reported from San Francisco and Sydney Ember from New York. John Herrman contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By MIKE ISAAC and SYDNEY EMBER

headline.print_headline: Facebook Tweaks Its News Feed to Focus on Friends and Family
headline.main: Facebook to Change News Feed to Focus on Friends and Family

snippet: News content posted by publishers will show up less prominently, resulting in less traffic to companies that have come to rely on Facebook audiences.
abstract: Facebook announces it is changing news feed algorithm so content posted by friends and family of user will show up more prominently than content posted by publishers; decision is blow to news and media outlets who rely on social media platform to access audience.
